title: Hossein Mozaffar
text:
Hossein Mozaffar () is an Iranian <a href="Iranian%20Principlists">conservative</a> politician who was <a href="Ministry%20of%20Education%20%28Iran%29">Minister of Education</a> under President <a href="Mohammad%20Khatami">Mohammad Khatami</a> and represented <a href="Tehran%2C%20Rey%2C%20Shemiranat%20and%20Eslamshahr%20%28electoral%20district%29">Tehran, Rey, Shemiranat and Eslamshahr</a> in the <a href="Majlis%20of%20Iran">Parliament of Iran</a> twice. He is currently a member of the <a href="Expediency%20Discernment%20Council">Expediency Discernment Council</a>.
He is considered an ally of <a href="Mohammad%20Bagher%20Ghalibaf">Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf</a> and close to <a href="Progress%20and%20Justice%20Population%20of%20Islamic%20Iran">Progress and Justice Population of Islamic Iran</a>. Mozaffar was Ghalibaf's campaign manager in <a href="2013%20Iranian%20presidential%20election">2013 presidential election</a>.
